code: var _this=this;export var debounce=function debounce(func,wait,immediate,args){var timeout;return function(){var context=_this;var callNow=immediate&&!timeout;var later=function later(){timeout=null;if(!immediate)func.apply(context,args);};clearTimeout(timeout);timeout=setTimeout(later,wait);if(callNow)func.apply(context,args);};};
